General.Name: Artroniq Berhad
General.Description: Artroniq Berhad, an investment holding company, manufactures and sells polyethylene compounds for wire and cable insulation, and jacketing in Malaysia, Asia, the Middle East, the Americas, and internationally. The company operates through Information and Communication Technology (ICT) Products, and Other segments. In addition, the company is involved in distribution of information and communication technology products, as well as engages in distribution of point of sales (POS) solutions, pos hardware, peripherals, and related services. Artroniq Berhad was incorporated in 2002 and is headquartered in Selangor, Malaysia.
